<cs> my lords it is not without some feelings of anxiety that any member of your lordships house addresses it for the first time <e> <s> i therefore ask for your lordships indulgence in listening to what i have to say <e> <s> i speak not from knowledge of government but from some knowledge of industry <e> <s> such contribution as i can make to this debate comes from spending many years where the action is actually taking place <e> <s> i support the motion so nobly moved by the noble baroness lady carnegy of lour <e>
